  - Player tracking, scores, winner
  - Location, duration, rating, notes
  - Basic statistics
- Custom Drupal module for content types

Tech stack:
- React 18, React Router v6, Tailwind CSS
- Drupal 11 backend with JSON:API
- Vite dev server with proxy configuration
